resources.string: Enter the Name of a Dictator
Enter the Name of an Organ
Enter the Name of an Electronics Store
Rick hands Morty a pill. Morty takes it.
Morty : What\'d you just give me, Rick?
Rick : It\'s a Mad Libs pill, Morty. It m-makes, makes-- * BURP * it makes you talk like you\'re in a Mad Libs, Morty.
Morty : What! But I have school in five
Morty : Why did I just say
Rick : I already told you, Morty, it\'s a Mad Libs pill! You\'re a Mad Libs man now!
Morty : But I don\'t wanna be a Mad Libs

Rick : Quit running your mouth, Morty! The person who\'s writing this Mad Libs thing wants some entertainment, Morty, so you have to do it! Don\'t make it so easy for these, these people to make you their puppet!
